traits.name: (Scout) Light-footed
traits.detail: You can Disengage or Dash as a bonus action. When an enemy moves adjacent to you, you can spend your reaction to move away up to half your speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Chalcia uses Fission/Fusion, then attacks once with her Greataxe or twice with her Handaxes (whichever is usable).

actions.name: Fission/Fusion
actions.detail: Chalcia splits her greataxe into two handaxes, or fuses the handaxes together again. Each creature within 30' of Chalcia must make a [dc-secondary] DEX save or take 3d6 lightning (fission) or fire (fusion) damage (half damage on successful save).

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs. AC. _Hit:_ [damage/2-7, d12] slashing damage, plus 2d6 fire damage.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.detail: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs. AC. _Hit:_ [damage/4-3, d6] slashing damage, plus 1d6 cold damage.

actions.name: Blinding Smite (Handaxe only)(3/day)
actions.detail: Chalcia casts _Blinding Smite_, so that her next hit deals an extra [damage/2, d8] radiant damage, and blinds the target until the spell ends ([dc-secondary] WIS save ends). She then attacks twice with her Handaxes.

actions.name: Thunderous Smite (Greataxe only)(3/day)
actions.detail: Chalcia casts _Thunderous Smite_, so that her next hit deals an extra 5d6 thunder damage, and the target must make a [dc-primary] STR save or be knocked prone. She then attacks once with her Greataxe.
